services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional photography services tailored to your needs

packages.title: Choose Your Package
packages.subtitle: Various packages to suit all requirements and budgets

family.title: Timeless Family Portraits
family.description: Capturing the essence of your family's bond through artistically crafted photographs that tell your unique story
family.extendedDescription: Transform your precious family moments into stunning works of art. Our expert photographers specialize in capturing authentic connections and genuine emotions that tell your unique family story.

adultBirthday.title: Elegant Birthday Celebrations
adultBirthday.description: Documenting your special day with a perfect blend of candid moments and beautifully composed photographs
adultBirthday.extendedDescription: Make your birthday celebration unforgettable with our professional photography services. We specialize in capturing the energy, emotions, and special moments of your celebration.

childrenBirthday.title: Magical Children's Celebrations
childrenBirthday.description: Creating enchanting photographs that capture the joy, wonder, and excitement of your child's special day
childrenBirthday.extendedDescription: Let us capture the magic and wonder of your child's special day. Our experienced photographers know exactly how to interact with children, ensuring natural smiles and authentic moments.

maternity.title: Artistic Maternity Sessions
maternity.description: Celebrating the beauty of motherhood through elegant and timeless maternity portraits
maternity.extendedDescription: Celebrate the beautiful journey of motherhood with our specialized maternity photography services. We create stunning portraits that capture the grace and beauty of this special time in your life.

fashion.title: Contemporary Fashion Photography
fashion.description: Elevating your brand with creative, high-impact fashion photography that makes a lasting impression
fashion.extendedDescription: Elevate your fashion brand with our professional photography services. Our team combines technical expertise with creative vision to produce stunning fashion imagery that captures attention.

booking.title: Book a Session
